attributes.additional_details:
To put an end to the divisive, time wasting, point scoring in parliament and actually debate and solve problems within the country.

This is not a football match and we don't need to pick a side.

We are all human beings and on the same side, we don't need to vote Conservative, Labour, Liberal Dem etc.
attributes.background:
Put an end to party politics and all MPs to work together for the good of the country. 

MPs to put forward candidates for Prime Minister which the country would vote to elect through general election.



The number of MPs to increase for more real and diverse points of view.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like to see changes to the current parliamentary system, but we're not exactly sure what changes you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
